text:
Director: We have a great game, great music, all we need is a great title.

Developer2:  You... play the game. You go from act 1 to act 2. You, uhh, raise the act. Actraiser?

Director: Perfect!

Everyone else: Why the hell is this game called Actraiser?
author: Bon

text: A esta canción para que sea completamente clásica le falta el grito "ha" del maestro cuando esgrime la espada!

text: Yuzo Koshiro is (one of) the best composer(s) of the 16-bit era, ever. This game along with Streets of Rage 2 is proof.

text:
Hahaha oh, this game and all its blatant religious connotations... not to mention the oh-so-modern mantra of "invade area, kill all indigenous life, develop until unrecognizable".

And, by god (or, I'm sorry, the master), I love the hell out of it.

author: SMcCall64

text:
Ok this is probably my favorite video game song ever.

No, really, it is.

I don't know why, I just remembered it constantly over the years, I remember finding it on the net years later and just feeling complete. It's such a quality song. It's got like the best opening for a song ever, its such a fast intro it makes you want to attack.
